name: youtube-html5-player
title: Youtube HTML5 Player
description: Youtube video player stucks a lot, this basic video player sucks less
author: Moez Bouhlel <bmoez.j@gmail.com> (http://lejenome.github.io/)

preferences.name: disableEmbed
preferences.title: Disable for Embed Youtube
preferences.description: Use default youtube video player for embed videos

preferences.name: dontPlayNext
preferences.title: Do not play next Item
preferences.description: Do not tell youtube that video reached the end, so it will no play the next Video on playlist mode
